name: Murderers
description:
Action game for ludum dare #33.

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=p...

Play as one of two different vampires who will battle humans for their life.

Tutorial included.
(Source included in the download)


Notes:
- No sound & no music (sorry)
- Only 2 skills per hero (sorry, my intention was at least 3 different per hero)

Made in Ruby & Gosu.
